TopicTitle: Looking for someone who can write plugins to help me with my mod

Articles.Content:
I am working on a greenscreen mod for KSP film makers. There are various sizes, ratios and colours of green screens and it would be nice if I could merge them all into one part. If anyone would able able to write me a plugin that does the following then comment below.

Requirements

-One part with right-click tweakable menu

-Screen ratio option in tweakable (either through scaling or by loading separate models)

-Scale option (ranging from 0.1m to 25m - the thickness stays the same though)

-Colour option (via loading textures or any other method you think would be possible)

I have made this mock-up in photoshop to give you some idea of what I mean.

EDIT: This mod is now finished, took a different approach though
